Classic Elegance Style: Refined, timeless, and polished. Characteristics: Clean lines, Luxurious fabrics, Neutral colors. Key pieces: Tailored blazers, Neutral dresses, Crisp white shirts, Structured coats. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: classic elegance.

Bohemian Chic Style: Freedom, creativity, and natural expression. Characteristics: Earthy tones, Flowing silhouettes, Handcrafted textures. Key pieces: Maxi dresses and skirts, Embroidered tops, Earthy prints, Layered accessories. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: bohemian chic.

Modern Minimalism Style: Less is more philosophy. Characteristics: Simple silhouettes, Muted tones, High-quality basics. Key pieces: Monochrome outfits, Straight-cut trousers, Structured coats, Solid neutral tops. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: modern minimalism.

Streetwear Edge Style: Comfort with bold attitude. Characteristics: Oversized silhouettes, Statement graphics, Urban culture. Key pieces: Hoodies & sweatshirts, Chunky sneakers, Oversized tees, Cargo pants. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: streetwear edge.

Avant-Garde Experimentation Style: Pushes creative boundaries and challenges traditional silhouettes. Characteristics: Asymmetric cuts, Oversized proportions, Unusual fabric combinations, Sculptural shapes. Key pieces: Asymmetric designs, Oversized pieces, Experimental fabrics. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: avant-garde experimentation.

Luxurious Glamour Style: Opulence, confidence, and show-stopping detail. Characteristics: High-fashion detail, Dramatic silhouettes, Sparkling elements. Key pieces: Silk gowns, Velvet suits, Dramatic silhouettes, Sparkling accessories. Seasons: all. Occasions: casual, formal. Keywords: luxurious glamour.
Neutral Palette: Timeless and versatile. Colors: Black, White, Gray, Beige, Navy. Use case: Professional, minimalist looks. Seasons: all.
Soft Combinations: Gentle and harmonious. Colors: Blush pink, Light gray, Pale blue, Cream, Mint green, Lavender. Use case: Romantic, feminine looks for spring/summer. Seasons: all.
Monochrome Look: Sophisticated and streamlined. Colors: Varying shades of single color. Use case: Creating unified, elegant looks. Seasons: all.
Contrasting Colors: Brings energy and dynamism. Colors: Blue + Orange, Purple + Yellow. Use case: Bold fashion statements. Seasons: all.
Spring/Summer: Pastels with Bold Pops: Delicate with vibrant twist. Colors: Mauve + Mustard, Light Blue + Coral. Use case: Warmer months, casual outings. Seasons: all.
Fall/Winter: Deep Earth Tones: Rich and grounding. Colors: Camel + Forest Green, Burgundy + Cream. Use case: Cozy, layered winter looks. Seasons: all.
Styling Tip (Balancing Outfits): Pair fitted tops with oversized bottoms
Styling Tip (Balancing Outfits): Pair baggy tops with fitted pants
Styling Tip (Balancing Outfits): Balance dark tops with lighter pants
Styling Tip (Balancing Outfits): Balance colors as well as silhouettes
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): Every woman should have a go-to necklace and pair of earrings
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): Balance statement and minimal elements
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): Layer necklaces thoughtfully for depth
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): Match accessories with intent to occasion
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): A black shoulder bag works with any outfit
Styling Tip (Accessorizing): Match shoes to your top or jacket
Styling Tip (Layering): Layering is a quick way to change simple pieces into new outfits
Styling Tip (Layering): Summer dress + tights + cardigan = winter outfit
Styling Tip (Layering): Crop top + blazer = office-appropriate look
Styling Tip (Layering): Combine different lengths and textures
Styling Tip (Color Coordination): Limit color palette to 3 colors maximum
Styling Tip (Color Coordination): Use the color wheel to identify harmonious combinations
Styling Tip (Color Coordination): Consider your skin tone when choosing colors
Styling Tip (Color Coordination): Balance bold colors with neutrals
Styling Tip (Color Coordination): Match accessories to complement the outfit
Styling Tip (Proportions): Puff sleeve crop top + straight-fit pants = balanced proportions
Styling Tip (Proportions): Oversized shirt + mini skirt = playful contrast
Styling Tip (Proportions): Fitted top + wide-leg pants = elongated silhouette
Styling Tip (Proportions): Balance structured pieces with softer silhouettes
